description: plate with flat rim; incised repeating organic design on rim with inscriptions inside ovals; interior incised with a pair of hands inside an organic element flanked by 2 birds facing outward
markings: untranslated inscriptions, in Hebrew, above and below central design and on rim; on sticker, on bottom of rim: <SUPERB/PASSOVER DISH/GERMAN C1750>; possible worn stamp fragments, on bottom
provenance: (William Gross, Tel Aviv, Israel); Purchased by the MIA in 2000.
title: Seder plate
